course_description: This course will focus on the chemistry of organic and organometallic compounds: specifically, how the molecular orbital theory can be used to predict structures and properties. The course covers kinetics, mechanisms, and catalysis. Students who withdraw from the lecture must withdraw from the co-requisite laboratory course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval
prerequisites: CHEM_OX 202 and CHEM_OX 202L as prerequisites or equivalent transfer credit.
